1528558109_1JqrogiDCFGRVVrCdxwP93wurKDSg.body: Mailinabox (https://mailinabox.email/) has made it very easy to install and manage a email server these days.

> [chinu](#comment_1_1GdYDatrDQH6Nd2rcj8wqHzzCcqGkqkur6): Use YunoHost (https://yunohost.org). It makes easy to host your mail server,xmpp, single account. You can install apps like wordpress,peertube,mastodon,nextcloud,etc(there are lot more, see the complete list here https://yunohost.org/#/apps). If you want to learn to host your own server, then also YunoHost is better way to learn and experiment.

Didn't know about this before. Thanks. I'll try it out on a virtual env.
